title: Although feasible, falling renewables costs might not benefit Bangladesh's energy sector's decarbonisation: Is this another ‘debt-fossil fuel production trap’?

Publication date: April 2024

Source: Energy for Sustainable Development, Volume 79

Author(s): Kumar Biswajit Debnath, Monjur Mourshed
